name: lang_gen
description: Token, grammar, etc generators in block_gen style

scripts.test: rm -f *.gen.coffee && mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.test-simple: rm -f *.gen.coffee && mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
